hero.title: MANOSANTA
hero.subtitle: Travel community
hero.description: Soulful services for those traveling in search of rest, health, or real connection. Weaving human bonds and designing tailor-made experiences.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Experiences thoughtfully designed for every type of traveler

wellness.title: Wellness Tourism
wellness.description: Gentle trips for people over 55. Experiences adapted to their pace, health, and expectations, with simple technology and attention to detail.

health.title: Health Tourism
health.description: Comprehensive experiences that include medical treatment, accommodation, and support. Tailor-made packages with clarity at every step.

local.title: Neighborhood Tourism
local.description: Live the city from within. Cultural events and neighborhood routes that connect merchants, artists, and locals with respect and reciprocity.

about.title: Who is behind Manosanta?
about.p1: Shay, a traveler at heart, now rooted in Medellín, Colombia. Her vocation is to create well-being for people passing through, not only in a place, but in life itself.
about.p2: In a fast-paced world, Manosanta is a reminder that living in the present is not only possible, it's necessary.
about.quote: To offer well-being, I need to know each person. Give them their time.
about.author: — Shay, Manosanta

contact.title: Would you like to travel differently?
contact.description: Manosanta is not an agency. It is a living experience, a way to weave well-being into the journey.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter and receive more useful information for your next conscious trip.

contact.footer: An open invitation to travel with soul from Medellín, Colombia
